ChunkText: please follow the directions under the recommendations section to invite your advisor to provide their support electronically. only click submit after you have uploaded all requirements. isss advisors will review your application and contact you within 2-3 business days after your advisor recommendation is received.
ContextBefore: process to apply for a new I-20 for the new degree program: login to your isss portal click on search forms in the top right corner of the page choose the relevant application change of education level read the directions and complete all sections of the application the application requires the support of your academic advisor.
ContextAfter: timeline and deadlines after you are admitted to your new program, you can begin preparing the financial documents. however, we cannot prepare a new I-20 for you until you complete your current program, except in unusual circumstances.
